permafrost.tundra.data

Class IDataHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.data.IDataHelper

  • public class IDataHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with IData objects.

                                          boolean recurse)
        Returns a clone of the given IData document.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to be duplicated.
        recurse - When true, nested IData documents and IData[] document lists will also be duplicated.
        Returns:
        A new IData document which is a copy of the given IData document.

        Parameters:
        document - An IData document.
        source - A simple or fully-qualified key identifying the value in the given IData document to be renamed.
        target - The new simple or fully-qualified key for the renamed value.
        Returns:
        The given IData document.

        Amends the given IData document with the key value pairs specified in the amendments IData document.
        Parameters:

        amendments - The list of key value pairs to amend the document with.

      • squeeze

        public static com.wm.data.IData squeeze(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                        boolean recurse)
        Trims all string values, then converts empty strings to nulls, then compacts by removing all null values.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to be squeezed.
        recurse - Whether to also squeeze embedded IData and IData[] objects.
        Returns:
        A new IData document that is the given IData squeezed.

      • substitute

        public static com.wm.data.IData substitute(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                           com.wm.data.IData scope,
                                           boolean recurse)
        Performs variable substitution on all elements of the given IData input document.
        Parameters:
        document - The IData document to perform variable substitution on.
        scope - The scope against which variables are are resolved.
        recurse - Whether embedded IData and IData[] should have variable substitution recursively performed on them.
        Returns:
        The variable substituted IData.

      • substitute

        public static com.wm.data.IData substitute(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                           java.lang.String defaultValue,
                                           com.wm.data.IData scope,
                                           boolean recurse)
        Performs variable substitution on all elements of the given IData input document.
        Parameters:
        document - The IData document to perform variable substitution on.
        defaultValue - The value to substitute if a variable cannot be resolved.
        scope - The scope against which variables are are resolved.
        recurse - Whether embedded IData and IData[] should have variable substitution recursively performed on them.
        Returns:
        The variable substituted IData.

      • substitute

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] substitute(com.wm.data.IData[] array,
                                             java.lang.String defaultValue,
                                             com.wm.data.IData scope,
                                             boolean recurse)
        Performs variable substitution on all elements of the given IData[].
        Parameters:
        array - The IData[] to perform variable substitution on.
        defaultValue - The value to substitute if a variable cannot be resolved.
        scope - The scope against which variables are are resolved.
        recurse - Whether embedded IData and IData[] should have variable substitution recursively performed on them.
        Returns:
        The variable substituted IData[].

      • normalize

        public static com.wm.data.IData normalize(com.wm.data.IData document)
        Returns a new IData document, where all nested IData and IData[] objects are implemented with the same class, and all fully-qualified keys are replaced with their representative nested structure.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to be normalized.
        Returns:
        A new normalized version of the given IData document.

      • clear

        public static void clear(com.wm.data.IData document)
        Removes all key value pairs from the given IData document.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to be cleared.

      • clear

        public static void clear(com.wm.data.IData document,
                         java.lang.String... keysToBePreserved)
        Removes all key value pairs from the given IData document except those with a specified key.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to be cleared.
        keysToBePreserved - List of simple or fully-qualified keys identifying items that should not be removed.

      • get

        public static java.lang.Object get(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                   java.lang.String key,
                                   java.lang.Object defaultValue)
        Returns the value associated with the given key from the given IData document, or if null the specified default value.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document.
        key - A simple or fully-qualified key identifying the value in the given IData document to be returned.
        defaultValue - A default value to be returned if the existing value associated with the given key is null.
        Returns:
        Either the value associated with the given key in the given IData document, or the given defaultValue if null.

      • get

        public static java.lang.Object get(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                   java.lang.String key)
        Returns the value associated with the given key from the given IData document.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document.
        key - A simple or fully-qualified key identifying the value in the given IData document to be returned.
        Returns:
        The value associated with the given key in the given IData document.

      • getAsArray

                                            java.lang.String key)
        Returns the value associated with the given key from the given IData document as an array.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document.
        key - A simple or fully-qualified key identifying the value in the given IData document to be returned.
        Returns:

      • put

        public static com.wm.data.IData put(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                    java.lang.String key,
                                    java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the value associated with the given key in the given IData document. Note that this method mutates the given IData document in place.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document.
        key - A simple or fully-qualified key identifying the value to be set.
        value - The value to be set.
        Returns:
        The input IData document with the value set.

      • put

        public static com.wm.data.IData put(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                    java.lang.String key,
                                    java.lang.Object value,
                                    boolean includeNull)
        Sets the value associated with the given key in the given IData document. Note that this method mutates the given IData document in place.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document.
        key - A simple or fully-qualified key identifying the value to be set.
        value - The value to be set.
        includeNull - When true the value is set even when null, otherwise the value is only set when it is not null.
        Returns:
        The input IData document with the value set.

        public static java.lang.String[] getKeys(com.wm.data.IData[] array)

        Parameters:
        array - An IData[] to retrieve the union set of keys from.
        Returns:
        The union set of keys from the given IData[].

      • getKeys

        public static java.lang.String[] getKeys(com.wm.data.IData[] array,
                                         java.lang.String patternString)
        Returns the union set of keys present in every item in the given IData[] document list that match the given regular expression pattern.
        Parameters:
        array - An IData[] to retrieve the union set of keys from.
        patternString - A regular expression pattern the returned keys must match.
        Returns:
        The union set of keys from the given IData[].

      • pivot

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] pivot(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                        boolean recurse)
        Converts an IData document to an IData[] document list with each item representing each key value tuple from the given document.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to pivot.
        recurse - Whether to recursively pivot embedded IData objects.
        Returns:
        The given IData document pivoted.

      • pivot

        public static com.wm.data.IData pivot(com.wm.data.IData[] array,
                                      java.lang.String delimiter,
                                      java.lang.String... pivotKeys)
        Returns an IData document where the keys are the values associated with given pivot key from the given IData[] document list, and the values are the IData[] document list items associated with each pivot key.
        Parameters:
        array - The IData[] to be pivoted.
        delimiter - The delimiter to use when building a compound key.
        pivotKeys - The keys to pivot on.
        Returns:
        The IData document representing the pivoted IData[].

      • sort

        public static com.wm.data.IData sort(com.wm.data.IData document)
        Sorts the given IData document by its keys in natural ascending order.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to be sorted by its keys.
        Returns:
        A new IData document which is duplicate of the given input IData document but with its keys sorted in natural ascending order.

      • sort

        public static com.wm.data.IData sort(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                     boolean recurse)
        Sorts the given IData document by its keys in natural ascending order.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to be sorted by its keys.
        recurse - A boolean which when true will also recursively sort nested IData document and IData[] document lists.
        Returns:
        A new IData document which is duplicate of the given input IData document but with its keys sorted in natural ascending order.

      • sort

        public static com.wm.data.IData sort(com.wm.data.IData document,
                                     boolean recurse,
                                     boolean descending)
        Sorts the given IData document by its keys in natural ascending or descending order.
        Parameters:
        document - An IData document to be sorted by its keys.
        recurse - A boolean which when true will also recursively sort nested IData document and IData[] document lists.
        descending - Whether to sort in descending or ascending order.
        Returns:
        A new IData document which is duplicate of the given input IData document but with its keys sorted in natural ascending order.

      • sort

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] sort(com.wm.data.IData[] array,
                                       java.lang.String key)
        Returns a new IData[] array with all elements sorted in ascending order by the values associated with the given key.
        Parameters:
        array - An IData[] array to be sorted.
        key - The key to use to sort the array.
        Returns:
        A new IData[] array sorted by the given key.

      • sort

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] sort(com.wm.data.IData[] array,
                                       java.lang.String key,
                                       boolean ascending)
        Returns a new IData[] array with all elements sorted in either ascending or descending order by the values associated with the given key.
        Parameters:
        array - An IData[] array to be sorted.
        key - The key to use to sort the array.
        ascending - When true, the array will be sorted in ascending order, otherwise it will be sorted in descending order.
        Returns:
        A new IData[] array sorted by the given key.

      • sort

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] sort(com.wm.data.IData[] array,
                                       java.lang.String[] keys)
        Returns a new IData[] array with all elements sorted in ascending order by the values associated with the given keys.
        Parameters:
        array - An IData[] array to be sorted.
        keys - The list of keys in order of precedence to use to sort the array.
        Returns:
        A new IData[] array sorted by the given keys.

        public static com.wm.data.IData[] sort(com.wm.data.IData[] array,
                                       java.lang.String[] keys,
                                       boolean ascending)
        Returns a new IData[] array with all elements sorted in either ascending or descending order by the values associated with the given keys.
        Parameters:
        array - An IData[] array to be sorted.
        keys - The list of keys in order of precedence to use to sort the array.
        ascending - When true, the array will be sorted in ascending order, otherwise it will be sorted in descending order.
        Returns:
        A new IData[] array sorted by the given keys.
